criteria: The system must validate the email and password format
The user must receive a confirmation email after registration
The account must be created successfully after all information is validated
The system must check the email against existing accounts
An error message should be displayed if the email is already in use
The system must prompt for a valid email format
The system must enforce password complexity requirements

attributes_and_rules: Email must be unique
Password must meet security criteria
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to register for an account, so that I can create a personalized profile and access my data.
user_stories.priority_business_value: High | Essential for enabling further account interactions

scenarios.name: Successful Registration
steps: Given the user is on the registration page
When the user enters valid details and submits the form
Then the user should receive a confirmation email
And their account should be created

scenarios.name: Registration with Existing Email
steps: Given the user is on the registration page
When the user enters an email that is already registered
Then an error message should be displayed indicating the email is taken

scenarios.name: Registration with Invalid Data
steps: Given the user is on the registration page
When the user enters an invalid email or password
Then an error message should be displayed with specific guidance

user_stories.title: User Registration

criteria: The system must validate user credentials correctly
The user must be redirected to the dashboard upon successful login
The system must display an error message for invalid credentials
The user must remain on the login page after a failed attempt
The account should be temporarily locked after 5 failed login attempts
A notification email should be sent to the user for account recovery

attributes_and_rules: Invalid login attempts must be limited
Session time out after inactivity
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log into my account, so that I can access my personal dashboard and account details.
user_stories.priority_business_value: High | Critical for user engagement and retention

scenarios.name: Successful Login
steps: Given the user is on the login page
When the user enters valid credentials
And clicks the login button
Then the user should be redirected to the dashboard
And a welcome message should be displayed

scenarios.name: Failed Login
steps: Given the user is on the login page
When the user enters invalid credentials
And clicks the login button
Then an error message should be displayed
And the user should remain on the login page

scenarios.name: Account Lockout
steps: Given the user is on the login page
When the user enters invalid credentials 5 consecutive times
Then the account should be temporarily locked
And a notification should be sent to the user's email
And instructions for account recovery should be displayed

user_stories.title: User Login

criteria: The system must validate the registered email before sending the reset link
The user must receive the reset link in their email
The message should confirm that a reset link has been sent
The user must be able to set a new password using the reset link
The new password should meet security criteria
The user should receive a message indicating the link has expired if they try to use an old link

attributes_and_rules: Password reset links must expire after 24 hours
User must verify their identity via email
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to recover my password, so that I can regain access to my account.
user_stories.priority_business_value: High | Essential for user retention and security

scenarios.name: Request Password Reset
steps: Given the user is on the forgot password page
When the user enters their registered email
And submits the form
Then a password reset link should be sent to the email
And a confirmation message should be displayed

scenarios.name: Reset Password with Valid Link
steps: Given the user receives a reset link in their email
When the user clicks on the reset link
And enters a new password
Then the password should be successfully updated
And the user should be able to log in with the new password

scenarios.name: Use Expired Reset Link
steps: Given the user tries to use an expired reset link
When the user attempts to set a new password
Then an error message should indicate that the link has expired

user_stories.title: Password Recovery

criteria: The user must be able to edit their personal information (e.g., name, email, etc.)
The system must save the updates successfully
The user must be able to view their current profile information
Profile information should be displayed accurately
The system must validate new data for correctness (e.g., valid email format)
An error message should be displayed for invalid inputs

attributes_and_rules: Profile updates must be saved correctly
Changes should reflect immediately
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to manage my account profile, so that I can update my personal information and preferences.
user_stories.priority_business_value: Medium | Important for user satisfaction and personalization

scenarios.name: Update Profile Information
steps: Given the user is logged in and on the profile page
When the user updates their personal information and submits the changes
Then the updates should be saved successfully
And the updated information should be reflected on the profile page

scenarios.name: View Profile Information
steps: Given the user is logged in and on the profile page
When the user views their information
Then the current profile information should be displayed accurately

scenarios.name: Invalid Profile Update
steps: Given the user is updating their profile information
When the user enters an invalid email
Then an error message should be displayed indicating the email is invalid

user_stories.title: Profile Management

criteria: The system must allow the user to enter product details
The system must validate that the product name is unique
The system must save the product and confirm success
The new product must be viewable in the catalog
The system must show an error message when the product name is not unique
The system must show an error message for empty product descriptions
The system must not allow saving the product until all validations pass
acceptance_criteria.scenario: Fail to Add Product due to Invalid Input

attributes_and_rules: Product name must be unique
Product price must be a positive number
Product description cannot be empty
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to add new products to the inventory, so that they can be available for customers to browse and purchase.

scenarios.name: Successful Product Addition
steps: Given the user is on the product addition page
When the user enters valid product details
And clicks the add product button
Then the product should be added to the catalog
And a success message should be displayed

scenarios.name: Duplicate Product Name Error
steps: Given the user is on the product addition page
When the user enters a product name that already exists
And submits the form
Then an error message indicating the name already exists should be displayed
And the product should not be added

user_stories.title: Add New Product

criteria: The system must allow the admin to edit product details
The system must validate that the updated price is a positive value
The system must confirm success after the update
The updated details must reflect in the product catalog
The system must not allow a price update with a negative number
The system must show an error message for invalid inputs
The product must remain unchanged if validations fail
acceptance_criteria.scenario: Fail to Update Product with Invalid Data

attributes_and_rules: Product can be updated only by an admin
Price must be a numeric value
Description can be modified but not removed
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to update existing product details, so that I can ensure all information is current and accurate.
user_stories.priority_business_value: High | Required for accurate product information

scenarios.name: Successful Product Update
steps: Given the admin is on the product update page
When the admin enters valid updated information
And clicks the update button
Then the system should confirm the update
And updated information should appear in the catalog

scenarios.name: Invalid Price Update Error
steps: Given the admin is on the product update page
When the admin enters an invalid negative price
And submits the form
Then an error message should be displayed
And the product should remain unchanged

user_stories.title: Update Product Details

criteria: The system must ask for confirmation before deletion
The system must remove the product upon confirmation
The product must no longer be visible in the catalog after deletion
The system must not delete the product if the user cancels the confirmation
The product must remain in the catalog

attributes_and_rules: Only admins can delete products
Deletion should require confirmation
Products that are deleted must not appear in the catalog
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to delete products from the catalog, so that I can remove outdated or unwanted items.

scenarios.name: Successful Product Deletion
steps: Given the admin is on the product list page
When the admin chooses to delete a product
And confirms the deletion
Then the product should be removed from the catalog
And a success message should be displayed

scenarios.name: Cancellation of Deletion
steps: Given the admin is on the product list page
When the admin chooses to delete a product
And cancels the deletion confirmation
Then the product should remain in the catalog
And no success message should be displayed

user_stories.title: Delete Product

criteria: The system must return relevant search results based on the query
The search results must be displayed in a user-friendly format
The user should be able to paginate through search results
The system must inform the user when no products match the search query
The search box should remain available for a new query

attributes_and_rules: Search should return products based on names, categories, or attributes
Search results should be pageable
Relevant search terms should highlight in results
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to search for products in the catalog, so that I can quickly find what I am looking for.

scenarios.name: Successful Product Search
steps: Given the customer is on the catalog page
When the customer enters a search term
And clicks the search button
Then relevant products should be displayed
And the customer should have the option to paginate

scenarios.name: No Search Results
steps: Given the customer is on the catalog page
When the customer enters a search term that matches no products
And clicks the search button
Then a message should indicate no results were found
And the search box should be ready for a new search

user_stories.title: Search Products

criteria: The system must allow assigning multiple categories to a product
The category must be displayed on the product page
The admin should be able to create new categories
The system must show an error if a user tries to save a product without categorization
The system must retain the product information if validations fail

attributes_and_rules: Each product must belong to at least one category
Categories should be manageable by admins
Categories can be hierarchical
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to categorize products, so that customers can easily browse through related items.

scenarios.name: Successful Categorization
steps: Given the admin is adding or editing a product
When the admin selects one or more categories
And submits the product details
Then the product should be categorized correctly
And categories should display on the product page

scenarios.name: Error on Missing Category
steps: Given the admin is on the product addition page
When the admin submits the product without a category
Then an error message should be displayed
And the product should not be saved

user_stories.title: Product Categorization

criteria: The user can view product details on the product page.
The user can click 'Add to Cart' button.
The cart count updates immediately after adding a product.
The system displays a confirmation message after a product is added.
The user can add multiple different products to the cart.
The cart total price updates correctly after each addition.
The user can view all added items in the shopping cart.

attributes_and_rules: The shopping cart must persist across sessions for logged-in users.
Guest users can add products but will lose their cart on session expiration.
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to add products to my shopping cart, so that I can purchase multiple items at once.
user_stories.priority_business_value: High | This functionality is essential for a positive user shopping experience.

scenarios.name: Add Single Product
steps: Given the user is on a product page
When the user clicks 'Add to Cart'
Then the product should be added to the shopping cart
And the cart count should increase by one
And a confirmation message should display 'Product added to cart'

scenarios.name: Add Multiple Products
steps: Given the user is on a product page
When the user adds multiple products to the cart
Then all selected products should appear in the shopping cart
And the total price should reflect the added products

user_stories.title: Add Product to Shopping Cart

criteria: The user can view an 'Remove' button next to each product in the cart.
Clicking the 'Remove' button prompts a confirmation.
Upon confirmation, the product is removed from the cart.
The total price updates accordingly.
The user can clear the entire shopping cart.
The system must confirm the action before clearing the cart.
After clearing, the cart should be empty and the total price should be zero.

attributes_and_rules: Removing an item should update the total price automatically.
Users should see a confirmation before removing an item.
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to remove products from my shopping cart, so that I can manage my selections easily.
user_stories.priority_business_value: High | This enhances the user's ability to manage their purchases.

scenarios.name: Remove Product
steps: Given the user has products in the shopping cart
When the user clicks the 'Remove' button on a product
And confirms the removal
Then the product should be removed from the cart
And the total price should decrease accordingly

scenarios.name: Clear Shopping Cart
steps: Given the user is in the shopping cart
When the user chooses to clear the cart
And confirms the action
Then the shopping cart should be empty
And the total price should be zero

user_stories.title: Remove Product from Shopping Cart

criteria: The user can increase the quantity of a product in the cart.
The total price updates immediately when the quantity increases.
The system displays a confirmation message for quantity change.
The user can decrease the quantity of a product.
If the quantity reaches zero, the product should be removed from the cart.
The total price updates immediately when the quantity decreases.

attributes_and_rules: The quantity must be a positive integer.
Modifying quantity should recalculate the total price.
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to modify the quantity of products in my shopping cart, so that I can adjust my order before checkout.
user_stories.priority_business_value: Medium | This provides flexibility in the user's order management.

scenarios.name: Increase Product Quantity
steps: Given the user has a product in the shopping cart with quantity of 1
When the user clicks on the increase quantity button
Then the quantity should be updated to 2
And the total price should reflect the increased quantity
And a confirmation message should state 'Quantity updated'

scenarios.name: Decrease Product Quantity to Zero
steps: Given the user has a product with a quantity of 1 in the cart
When the user clicks on the decrease quantity button
Then the quantity should be zero
And the product should be removed from the cart
And the total price should be updated accordingly

user_stories.title: Modify Quantity of Products in Shopping Cart

criteria: The system saves the current state of the cart when the user logs out.
The next time the user logs in, the previous cart state should be retrieved.
The cart must contain all products that were in the cart at logout.
The user can modify the cart before logging out.
Upon logging back in, changes made before logout should be preserved.
The total price must reflect any modifications made.

attributes_and_rules: The cart state must be saved to the user's profile.
The saved cart must be retrievable across multiple sessions.
user_stories.description: As a logged-in user, I want to save my shopping cart state, so that I can retrieve it later when I log back in.
user_stories.priority_business_value: High | This feature enhances user convenience and loyalty.

scenarios.name: Save Cart on Logout
steps: Given the user has products in their shopping cart
When the user logs out
Then the shopping cart should be saved to the user's profile
And the next time the user logs in, the cart should reflect the previous items

scenarios.name: Preserve Modifications After Logout
steps: Given the user adds a product to their cart and logs out
When the user logs back in
Then the cart should contain the added product
And the total price should reflect the quantity and price of the products

user_stories.title: Save Shopping Cart for Logged-in Users
